title: Aim for Mastering the Nico
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Nico will train you directly too, just like Nico did with Dia.... You may rejoice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Don’t tell me.... Are we going to practice that pose....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That’s right. If you want to be the best school idol, though not better than me, then just ask Nico to teach you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>O-, okay.... But I uhh, umm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Alright, here we go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Listen to what I have to say!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Whoa, what are you doing!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I-, I’m sorry, I’ll do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Geez, Riko, your blouse’s sleeve’s button is on the brink of coming off. It can’t be helped~, Nico will fix it. Ah, you don’t have to take it off. Come on, give me your arm<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>T-, thank you.... Nico-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
